summary: Change the appearance of the Spellbreaker to something more Spellbreaking..
descriptionHtml:
Replaces the default textures with larger , modified 1024x1024 textures and a custom bump map.

*****************************************************************************
Using the Nexus Mod Manager is highly recommended.
*****************************************************************************

Manual Install:
Extract the archive in your Skyrim Installation folder

Manual Uninstall:
Delete the folder spellbreaker in ../Data/textures/armor

*****************************************************************************
Redistribution with or without further editing is prohibited without my prior consent.
*****************************************************************************
